# to go straight ahead; to [[rush]]; to [[charge]]; to [[dash]]
#* {{zh-x|衝進|break in, burst in, force into}}

# to [[clash]]; to [[collide]]
#* {{zh-x|衝擊|attack, shock}}
#* {{zh-x|衝撞|to collide}}
#* {{zh-x|衝突|conflict, collision of interest}}
